title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1481/98 of 10 July 1998 setting the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and figs from the 1997/98 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1481/98 of 10 July 1998 setting the storage aid for unprocessed dried grapes and figs from the 1997/98 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 July 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
